West Bromwich Albion swiftly put their temporary disappointment at Coventry City behind them to climb into the top half of the Championship table with a routine win over Bristol City on Boxing Day.
… [+6154 chars]

articles.title: Declan Rice trusts West Ham United's quality will shine through | Premier League | NBC Sports - NBC Sports
articles.description: Declan Rice said West Ham have the ability to turn their season around and work their way up the Premier League table. #NBCSports #PremierLeague #DeclanRice»...
